title: 12.) Top 40 Countdown - I'm Afraid of People Getting Mad at Me
description:
8-year-old Austin and his mom call Dr. Laura about his anxiety and fears of saying “no” to anyone. - Dr. Laura: "A child's behavioral issues typically start with the parents."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
